home.title: Hi, I'm Sara
home.info: A full stack .NET developer based in Stockholm, who is passionate about coding, horror movies and outdoor adventures!

about.info:
I am a developer who transitioned from a long background in dentistry and pedodontics. My interest in computers and technology goes back as far as I can remember and hasn't subsided since.
 
Recently, I had the chance to turn my lifelong passion into a career when I was selected to attend </salt> bootcamp. 

I love the problem-solving aspect of coding and have a desire to constantly learn new skills and improve.
